name: x86libm
short_description: Mathematical library for x86 processors with maximum possible perfomance. Work with almost all modern compiler and OS. _IEEE_, _SVID_, _XOPEN_, _POSIX_, _ISOC_ conformant. Consist from two pieces: for generic x86 and for pentium pro. In last case use ppro
